# zedcloud_kubernetes_cluster_status (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `architecture` (String) Architecture of the zks instance
- `capacity` (Block List) Capacity information of the zks instance (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--capacity))
- `cluster_prefix` (String) Cluster prefix for the ZKS instance
- `created` (String) Creation time of the zks instance
- `deployments` (Number) Number of deployments in the zks instance
- `description` (String) Detailed description of the zks instance
- `fleet_workspace_name` (String) Name of the Fleet workspace associated with the ZKS instance
- `id` (String) System defined universally unique Id of the zks instance
- `is_imported` (Boolean) Indicates if the ZKS instance is imported from an external source
- `kube_version` (String) Kubernetes version of the zks instance
- `n_of_nodes` (Number) Number of nodes in the zks instance
- `name` (String) User defined name of the zks instance, unique across the enterprise. Once zks instance is created, name canâ€™t be changed
- `project_id` (String) Foreign key to the project
- `project_name` (String) Name of the project to which the zks instance belongs
- `run_state` (String) Current state of the zks instance
- `tags` (Map of String) Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources.
- `title` (String) User defined title of the zks instance. Title can be changed at any time
- `total_number_of_nodes` (Number) Total number of nodes in the ZKS instance
- `total_resources` (Number) Total resources in the zks instance
- `x_request_id` (String)
- `zks_base_url` (String) Base URL of the ZKS instance
- `zks_cluster_id` (String) ZKS cluster ID
